name: chautauqua-backend
description: Lambda functions for Chautauqua calendar generation

scripts.build: npm run test && npm run build:dev
scripts.build:dev: npx esbuild src/handlers/*.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node24 --outdir=dist --external:aws-sdk && npx esbuild src/services/*.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outdir=dist/services --format=cjs --external:aws-sdk --external:@aws-sdk/client-dynamodb --external:@aws-sdk/lib-dynamodb --external:axios --external:cheerio --external:date-fns && npx esbuild src/server.ts --bundle --platform=node --target=node18 --outfile=dist/server.js --format=cjs --external:aws-sdk
scripts.deploy: npm run build && zip -r lambda-function.zip dist/ package.json && aws lambda update-function-code --function-name chautauqua-calendar-generator --zip-file fileb://lambda-function.zip
scripts.package: npm run build:prod && zip -r lambda-function.zip dist/ package.json node_modules/
